properties.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
properties.description: Detects usage of "appcmd" to create new global URL rewrite rules. This behaviour has been observed being used by threat actors to add new rules so they can access their webshells.
properties.displayName: Suspicious IIS URL GlobalRules Rewrite Via AppCmd
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "set" and ProcessCommandLine contains "config" and ProcessCommandLine contains "section:system.webServer/rewrite/globalRules" and ProcessCommandLine contains "commit:") and (FolderPath endswith "\\appcmd.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "appcmd.exe")
